title: Solomon Builds His Palace and Furnishes the Temple
summary: Solomon builds his palace over thirteen years and then completes the furnishings of the temple, including the bronze pillars, basin, and golden items. The work is done with great craftsmanship and detail.

faq.question: What else did Solomon build besides the temple?

faq.question: Who crafted the temple furnishings?
faq.answer: Hiram of Tyre, a skilled bronze worker.
